reviews.review: mimo przerw i tak wracam do tej perełki ^^

Generally, this is one of the most refined competitive first-person shooters on the market. Although solo play is not generally present, multiplayer options are always available. When the game became free, it made the game easy to pick up for lower-income players. All of the competitive modes can be unlocked completely for free, and the grind is not too demanding to achieve such things.
Since its release, there have been many updates and additions that have made this game extremely complex. The recent addition of Danger Zone has made appealing to the casual player who does not like the nature of the core game modes more viable.
All-in-all, this game is timeless. It makes for a good entry into competitive gaming!
